set.set_2: Use this weapon to increase all attack types by **13%**/**17%**/**21%**/**25%**. The lower the HP, the higher the healing received, which can be increased by up to **100%**.
set.set_4: When dealing physical damage, increase physical damage by **3%** with a cooldown of **0.1** seconds. Stack up to **5** times. Upon reaching the maximum stacks, increase physical damage by an additional **4%**/**7%**/**11%**/**14%** for **5** seconds. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly. Obtain **1** block for each dodge, blocking damage up to **60%** of current HP, but not less than **20%** of Max HP. Stack up to **3** blocks for **1000 seconds**.
